## Clearest and muddiest things

`r blogdown::shortcode("feedback")`


```{r class-stuff, include=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggdag)
library(dagitty)

dag <- dagify(Y ~ X + Z,
              # X ~ Z,
              coords = list(
                x = c(X = 1, Y = 2, Z = 1.5),
                y = c(X = 1, Y = 1, Z = 2)
              ),
              labels = c(Y = "Malaria infection rate", 
                         X = "Mosquito nets", 
                         Z = "Nighttime temperatures"),
              exposure = "X",
              outcome = "Y") %>% tidy_dagitty()

ggplot(dag, aes(x = x, y = y, xend = xend, yend = yend)) +
  geom_dag_edges() +
  geom_dag_point() +
  geom_dag_text() +
  geom_dag_label_repel(aes(label = label), nudge_y = 0.1, seed = 1234) +
  theme_dag()

front <- dagify(C ~ T + G,
                T ~ S,
                S ~ G,
                coords = list(
                  x = c(S = 1, T = 2, C = 3, G = 2),
                  y = c(S = 1, T = 1, C = 1, G = 2)
                ),
                labels = c(S = "Smoking", 
                           T = "Tar", 
                           C = "Cancer",
                           G = "Genetics"),
                exposure = "S",
                outcome = "C") %>% tidy_dagitty()

ggplot(front, aes(x = x, y = y, xend = xend, yend = yend)) +
  geom_dag_edges() +
  geom_dag_point() +
  geom_dag_text() +
  geom_dag_label_repel(aes(label = label), nudge_y = 0.1, seed = 1234) +
  theme_dag()
```
